DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the optimal method to withdraw non-invasive ventilation after an episode of hypercapnic respiratory failure.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assessing Two Protocols to Withdraw Non-invasive Ventilation in Hypercapnic Respiratory Failure
DOC.criteria: Acute hypercapnic respiratory failure. Use of NIV to treat respiratory failure. Persistence of hypercapnia after discontinuation of NIV Home NIV Facial or cranial trauma or surgery, Recent gastric or esophageal surgery, Active upper gastrointestinal bleeding, Excessive amount of respiratory secretions, Tracheostomy Lack of cooperation
